description: Google Clone is a web application that replicates the functionality and design of the Google search engine. Users can perform searches, view search results, and navigate through various search features.
features: Google search features (e.g., images, news, videos)
technologiesUsed: API Integration: Google Custom Search API

description: Netflix Clone is a web application that mimics the design and functionality of the Netflix streaming platform. Users can browse and search for movies and TV shows, view details, and watch trailers.
technologiesUsed: API Integration: TMDB API (for movie/TV show data)

description: Pexels Clone is a web application that replicates the functionality of the Pexels stock photo platform. Users can search for high-quality, royalty-free images, and download or save them for later use.
Video Calling App is a real-time communication application that allows users to make video calls with others over the internet. Users can initiate calls, join existing calls, and chat during calls.
